content.question: Which of the following functions is not continuous on the interval <math alttext="negative infinity, is less than x, is less than infinity" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="f of x, equals, 4 times x squared, minus 2 x, plus 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="g of x, equals, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator x cubed, plus 3 times x squared, minus 2 x, minus 5, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="h of x, equals, the cosine of, open parenthesis, pi x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="k of x, equals, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator e to the x power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="g of x, equals, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator x cubed, plus 3 times x squared, minus 2 x, minus 5, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
